entry_added.summary: Implemented worktree core module with WorktreeConfig, derive_speck_slug (Spec S05), sanitize_branch_name (D08), GitCli wrapper, create_worktree with partial failure recovery, list_worktrees, cleanup_worktrees with merge detection (D09). Added worktree error variants E028-E034. Fixed error handling after auditor review. 4 unit tests pass.
